Professional Experience.name: Summer Intern
Professional Experience.summary: I analyzed the landscape of cloud computing from a game theory perspective, with a focus on the impact of software improving ease of use of multiple cloud services (multicloud).

Military Service.name: Researcher in an Audio Research Section
Military Service.summary: My job was to plan, train, implement, and monitor algorithms for analysis of audio. This included everything from researching solutions, modifying them to suit the data, implementing them as part of a software pipeline, and working with users to find issues.

Military Service.name: Software Developer in a Research Section
Military Service.summary: My job was to develop and maintain software used by signal processing researchers. As part of my role I also implemented, optimized, and wrote algorithms for various purposes.

Military Service.name: Software Development Course
Military Service.summary: Intensive course in software development, primarily high-level languages
